appearances.title: Dan Wang, "Breakneck - China's Quest to Engineer the Future" : CSPAN3 : January 3, 2026 11:02am-12:32pm EST
appearances.snippet: january 3rd, 2026 i hereby appoint the honorable christopher h. smith to act as speaker pro tempore on this day. signed mike johnson, speaker of the house of representatives. >> the prayer will be offered by chaplain kibben. >> would you pray with me? holy and eternal god, we commend to you this past year and pray your blessing over all our efforts. should we be consumed with pride over our accomplishments, humble us for nothing we do is outside of your sovereign plan. should we be overwhelmed with frustration, believing our best attempts have been thwarted? raise us up for all things, when done in good faith, will find reward in the fullness of time. all of this, our successes, our failures, our achievements, our losses. we commend to you, for any glory we gain is like the flowers of the field, and any defeat we suffer is like the grass that withers. but your word, o lord, endures forever. speak, then, your final word. over the first half of the 119th congress, that we would know the might of your righteousness and the mercy of your reward. all this we
